page.title: 15HOLTON ARTS AND CRAFTS
page.content: Inventive art i.e.design is the keynote to art in this village. There is a teacher of fashion design who designs knitwear, her husband teaches painting and sells his paintings at exhibitions. We have an architect working for the County Council who works in silver and gold at home. One Building firm designs and makes furniture for house and garden, another restores & repairs Churches & houses. A young mother teaches art in a comprehensive school. A woodworker with a degree in painting makes beehives. The ladies in the village knit & design clothes for their families & regular meetings are held by Church ladies who embroider for the Church & sell craft work for Church funds.
